name: COND_CD
description: All values associated with a claim are stored in the Claim External Value record.  The COND_CD table holds the condition codes that apply to the claim.

columns.name: RECORD_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the claim record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number of one of the multiple values associated with a specific group of data within this record.

columns.name: COND_CD
columns.description: This item holds the condition codes that apply to the claim.
